text: geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-i hananim-eul salanghandamyeon naleul ttaleula. geuleomyeon hananimkkeseo geudaedeul-eul salanghasil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui joeleul yongseohaejusil geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-imyeo jaaelousin bun-ila.’
